title: Sweet potato patties with grilled bacon and poached duck eggs
ingredients: ['450g cooked sweet potato, mashed', 'crushed black pepper, to taste', '1 small pak choi, finely sliced', '1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika', '1/4 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 garlic clove, chopped', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 to 2 tablespoons polenta flour, plus extra for coating', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '4 duck eggs', 'oil, for frying', '8 rashers dry cured bacon', 'extra virgin olive oil, to taste']
